message:
fix: DEV-3211: Parse all timeseries timestamps to utc to avoid improper calculations using possible daylight savings time (#812)

* fix: DEV-3211: Parse all timeseries timestamps to utc to avoid improper calculations using possible daylight savings time

* fix: DEV-3211: parse and format timeseries data in UTC

* fix: DEV-3211: ensure all of d3 is set to scale in UTC as well
